posts.title: 暑假不学习我就狗带
posts.text: 明天开始考第一门 七月六号回家 暑假不学习我就狗带，我杀我自己 还想去看蔡徐坤演唱会呜呜┭┮﹏┭┮ 把我的博客整得干干净净漂漂亮亮里里啥啥 争取写几篇有技术的吼吼

posts.title: about machine learning
posts.text: I know nothing about it. I don’t know who give me the courage to choose this coure. Maybe Liang Jingru. At least, there is one good thing that I know I am not interested in machine learning and I am not suitable for it. Final exam is coming. Oh God!

posts.title: 尝试发布一条新帖子
posts.text: I’m here. Yesterday, I took the test four for English majors. It sucks. I’m struggling… Once upon a time, I thought I found the goal of my life. I was excited, and I never felt so close to what called success. But, I am just ordinary. Knowledge doesn’t come easliy. It won’t come to you just because you put the learning videos into favorites or you bought some books without reading. Set so many flags but all fall. hhh, keep fighting. I want a happy and rich life. I want to become nb.

posts.title: 寒假日常
posts.text: 第一天 刷手机 第二天 刷手机 第三天 刷手机 第四天 刷手机 第五天 刷手机 第六天 tmd, 烦死了。老子要学习！ 第七天 刷手机。。。

posts.title: hello world!
posts.text: Hi. This is my first blog. I’m very excited.

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
